snippet: Sikorsky Aircraft and Lockheed Martin won a $1.24 billion contract on Wednesday to begin building a new presidential helicopter.
abstract: Sikorsky Aircraft and Lockheed Martin win a $1.24 billion contract to begin building new presidential helicopter.
lead_paragraph: Sikorsky Aircraft and Lockheed Martin won a $1.24 billion contract on Wednesday to begin building a new presidential helicopter.

headline.main: Sikorsky and Lockheed to Build New Presidential Helicopter
headline.print_headline: Sikorsky and Lockheed to Build New Presidential Helicopter
